Text:
hey Dodecahedron9,

really appreciate the ups dude! any chance you are going to upload episode 3 please?
Hi, I'm also looking for that episode, no one has released it yet, all I found were fakes. Hopefully this week Omicron might post both the new episode and the missing one. I'm crossing my fingers...
Both episodes 3 and 4, are now available on the Usenet. I can't confirm if they're real or not, I don't have a usenet account. So, I'm still waiting for a release :(
I'l also searching every day for ep 3&4...will post if I find it.
